spec_data.Name: perl-DateTime-Event-Recurrence
spec_data.Description:
This module provides convenience methods that let you easily create
DateTime::Set objects for various recurrences, such as "once a month" or
"every day". You can also create more complicated recurrences, such as
"every Monday, Wednesday and Thursday at 10:00 AM and 2:00 PM".
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:38:46 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: DateTime::Set extension for create basic recurrence sets
